document.full_text: the tsunami risk to the united states as a result of the massive earthquake off japan will hopefully be over in the next two to five hours, laura furgione, a senior official at the u.s. national oceanic and atmospheric administration, told reporters.
document.title: tsunami risk to u.s. hopefully over in 5 hours: noaa
lines_and_colors: the tsunami risk to the united states as a result of the massive earthquake off japan will hopefully be over in the next two to five hours, laura furgione, a senior official at the u.s. national oceanic and atmospheric administration, told reporters.
